description: Detects a suspicious printer driver installation with an empty Manufacturer value
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Alerts on legitimate printer drivers that do not set any more details in the Manufacturer value
name: Suspicious Printer Driver Empty Manufacturer
query: ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll]\\[Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt]\\[Ee][Nn][Vv][Ii][Rr][Oo][Nn][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Xx]64\\[Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss].*/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Mm][Aa][Nn][Uu][Ff][Aa][Cc][Tt][Uu][Rr][Ee][Rr].*/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:/\([Ee][Mm][Pp][Tt][Yy]\)/) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Cc][Uu][Tt][Ee][Pp][Dd][Ff]\ [Ww][Rr][Ii][Tt][Ee][Rr]\ [Vv]4\.0\\.*/) OR (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\[Vv][Nn][Cc]\ [Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr]\ \([Pp][Ss]\)\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Vv][Nn][Cc]\ [Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr]\ \([Uu][Dd]\)\\.*/)) OR (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\-3\\[Pp][Dd][Ff]24\\.*/))))
